pytest
3
.
0
.
6
has
just
been
released
to
PyPI
.
This
is
a
bug
-
fix
release
being
a
drop
-
in
replacement
.
To
upgrade
:
:
pip
install
-
-
upgrade
pytest
The
full
changelog
is
available
at
http
:
/
/
doc
.
pytest
.
org
/
en
/
latest
/
changelog
.
html
.
